snippet.title: No Umbrellas Allowed Trailer (January 2021)
snippet.description:
"No Umbrellas Allowed" is a Pawnshop simulation game set in Ajik City, 2080.
Reveal the true value of strange items, and haggle prices with customers.

SPECIAL PROMOTION! 20% OFF during Steam Winter Sale! Offer ends January 5th.
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1301390
